premise_source_doc_sentence: Paul T. Scheuring  (  born November 20 , 1968  )  is an American screenwriter and director of films and television shows .

claim: Prison Break was created by the screenwriter and director Paul Scheuring .
premise_source_doc_sentence: His work includes the 2003 film A Man Apart and the creation of the television drama Prison Break , for which he was also credited as an executive producer and head writer .

claim: Prison Break was created by the screenwriter and director Paul Scheuring .
premise_source_doc_sentence: The fifth season of Prison Break  (  also known as Prison Break : Resurrection  )  is a limited event television series and the continuation of the original series created by Paul Scheuring that aired on Fox from 2005 to 2009 .

claim: Prison Break was created by the screenwriter and director Paul Scheuring .
premise_source_doc_sentence: Prison Break is an American television serial drama created by Paul Scheuring , that was broadcast on Fox for four seasons from August 29 , 2005 to May 15 , 2009 , and a fifth season which premiered on April 4 , 2017 .
